source.4357dc30:
cen0_29 = kerala_census.groupby("District name").mean()
Age0_29=kerala_census[['Age_Group_0_29']].to_dict()
Y09=["0-29" for i in range(14)]
S0_29=list(kerala_census["District name"])
P0_29=list(Age0_29['Age_Group_0_29'].values())


cen30_49 = kerala_census.groupby("District name").mean()
Age30_49=kerala_census[['Age_Group_30_49']].to_dict()
Y30=["30-49" for i in range(14)]
S30_49=list(kerala_census["District name"])
P30_49=list(Age30_49['Age_Group_30_49'].values())


cen50 = kerala_census.groupby("District name").mean()
Age50=kerala_census[['Age_Group_50']].to_dict()
Y50=["50+" for i in range(14)]
S50=list(kerala_census["District name"])
P50=list(Age50['Age_Group_50'].values())


Data = {'Age_Group':Y09+Y30+Y50,'Districts':S0_29+S30_49+S50,'Population':P0_29+P30_49+P50}
DF = pd.DataFrame(data=Data)
ax = plt.subplots(figsize=(20, 20))
sns.barplot(y=DF.Population,x=DF.Districts,hue=DF.Age_Group)
plt.show()
source.f5ab0b91:
cen0_29 = kerala_census.groupby("District name").mean()
Male=kerala_census[['Male']].to_dict()
Y09=["Male" for i in range(14)]
S0_29=list(kerala_census["District name"])
P0_29=list(Male['Male'].values())


cen30_49 = kerala_census.groupby("District name").mean()
Female=kerala_census[['Female']].to_dict()
Y30=["Female" for i in range(14)]
S30_49=list(kerala_census["District name"])
P30_49=list(Female['Female'].values())


Data = {'Gender':Y09+Y30,'Districts':S0_29+S30_49,'Population':P0_29+P30_49}
DF = pd.DataFrame(data=Data)
ax = plt.subplots(figsize=(20, 20))
sns.barplot(y=DF.Population,x=DF.Districts,hue=DF.Gender)

source.c0fb79e3:
cen0_29 = kerala_census.groupby("District name").mean()
Rural_Households=kerala_census[['Rural_Households']].to_dict()
Y09=["Rural" for i in range(14)]
S0_29=list(kerala_census["District name"])
P0_29=list(Male['Male'].values())


cen30_49 = kerala_census.groupby("District name").mean()
Urban_Households=kerala_census[['Urban_Households']].to_dict()
Y30=["Urban" for i in range(14)]
S30_49=list(kerala_census["District name"])
P30_49=list(Urban_Households['Urban_Households'].values())


Data = {'Household_Type':Y09+Y30,'Districts':S0_29+S30_49,'Population':P0_29+P30_49}
DF = pd.DataFrame(data=Data)
ax = plt.subplots(figsize=(20, 20))
sns.barplot(y=DF.Population,x=DF.Districts,hue=DF.Household_Type)
source.0e482d90:
plt.subplots(figsize = (15,8))
ct = kerala_census.groupby('District name')['Households_with_Internet'].sum()
ax = ct.sort_values(ascending=False).plot(kind="bar")

plt.show()
source.f8b149a6: Thiruvanathapuram is the district with  more electrified households followed by Ernakulam.
source.22559ef2: Young population (0-29) is more in Malappuram , whereas the above 50+ population is high in Ernakulam.
source.67b53e4b: Ernakulam is the district with more Internet connectivity inhouseholds followed by Thiruvanathapuram.
source.8f5dbaae: Malappuram is the most populated district in Kerala followed by Thiruvananthapuram & Ernakulam.
source.06b67df8: Ernakulam is the district with more working population , followed by Thiruvananthapuram & Thrissur.
source.28c24627: Women population is more in all the districts in kerala.
source.cb71aac4: Malappuram is the district with more educated population followed by Thiruvanathapuram & Ernakulam.
source.45365a5b: Ernakulam is the district with most graduates , followed by Thiruvananthapuram & Thrissur.
source.f5300f3b: Agricultural workers are more in Palakkad, followed by Idukki & Malappuram.
source.c3d06e21: Mallapuram is having the most literate population followed by Ernakulam & Thiruvanathapuram .
source.4fb8c167: Rural households are more in Malappuram , whereas Urban population is more in Ernakulam.
source.41ec7bbd: Hinduism is the most followed religion in Kerala followed by Islam.
source.b3597606: Ernakulam is having more households followed by Thiruvanathapuram.
